content:
@Sean Isom you mentioned that you think that the present function should live in mini-canvas.
I don't have a strong preference on this, but seems like wgpu and softbuffer both put them on the graphics api. (wgpu, softbuffer), does that change your opinion at all?
Discussed at the weekly meeting, agreed (by @Sean Isom, @Jorge Prendes, and me) to put in the graphics-api since that's much more common.
